item.description:
DUE to a work schedule change I can no longer meetup on Sundays. If there are no Yes RSVP's to this on Saturdays I will cancel that morning as we can go locally where there will definitely be other dogs to play with...

This is my favorite dog park because it's in a beautiful natural setting in the woods. It's only a short hike to it so we get to enjoy a nice walk beforehand. Just be careful when using google or a GPS as I was directed by them to enter the park on the opposite side from the entrance via non-passable "paths". I have found using The Pines Restaurant as a direction point when mapping it is a great way to find it easily as it's just down the street from the Park. There is plenty of parking too! Look for my blue Yaris or a green CRV and my black lab Beau.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us near the parking lot or horseshoes. I have a black lab.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Raymond Riverside Dog Park - Update
